color

color

Classes

RGBAColor

Members

<static> color.parse

Parses a color value and returns an RGBAColor instance

Methods

<static> color

Parses a color value and returns a color.RGBAColor instance.

Parameters:
Name Type Description
c String | Number | RGBAColor

The color to be parsed, a number of the form 0x<rr><gg><bb><aa>, a string (color name found in color_map) or a any of rgb, rgba, hsl, hsla, or hex (#RRGGBB).
Returns:

An RGBAColor instance or null for failed parsing

Type
null | RGBAColor
